segments.text: Hey , May , how are you doing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I'm a little busy these days .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don ’ t you know Christmas is coming ? I have a lot of things to get ready .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But you ’ re in China . Are you planning on going home for Christmas ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , so I have to buy presents for everyone before I leave .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why not just give them money in red envelopes ? That would be much easier .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Americans don ’ t like giving money , they prefer presents you buy for them . So I have to figure out what to buy for all of my family and friends .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've got it . I won ’ t bother you any more . You ’ d better hurry to do it , Christmas is just around the corner .
segments.speaker: S1
